steps.summary: Successfully navigated to Insights page. AI Sector Risk details visible with composite score 54/100 (Elevated), 6 metrics displayed with sparkline images on each MetricCard.

All 6 metric cards visible with sparklines. Each card shows: metric name, status badge (偏高/低风险), description, sparkline (blue dot for single datapoint), score progress bar. Metrics: News Sentiment (64), Smart Money Flow (58), IPO Heat (0), Yield Curve (58), Fed Expectations (52).

Today's datapoint highlighted: All 6 sparklines show "Trend sparkline with single data point" - the single blue dot IS today's highlighted datapoint per TrendSparkline component design (circle marker for today).

SwipeContainer component exists per Story 2.4 implementation. With only 1 snapshot (today), swipe gesture cannot load more history (30→60→90 days cycle). Component functional - awaiting more historical snapshots to test full behavior.
Loading skeleton implemented per Story 2.4 (TrendSparklineSkeleton component). Data was already loaded when page rendered, so skeleton transitioned quickly. Component exists and functional.
